name.ja: <ruby>転生炎獣<rt>サラマングレイト</rt></ruby>ウィーゼル

text.en: If you have 2 or more "Salamangreat" monsters in your GY: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If a "Salamangreat" Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and/or Link Monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 other "Salamangreat" monster in your GY; place this card on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon that monster to your opponent's field, then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Salamangreat Wheesel" once per turn.
